text:
@senatemajldr And helping the people who lost their jobs?
Any thought given to them?
Or the States/Local Governments doing the Federal Government’s work in addressing the Coronavirus?
Any thoughts for them?
You seem to consider the @GOP friends’ needs very well.
Despicable party @GOP
